QuestData.Title: All That Glitters
QuestData.Description: Now that the shield is down, the older settlements outside the city have been on my mind.$b$bDid you know that I helped create the filigree on the arcane lamps that are used throughout the city? A simple task, one of my first...$b$bNo matter. Nostalgia is the enemy of progress. The lamps are made of material better used in my new works.$b$bThose wretched harpies probably have several decorating their nests. Bring back any you find.
QuestData.CompletionText: Can you imagine, a Lespin original hiding under a pile of leaves? What a waste.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. I shall have these melted down and turned into ingots for my next batch of commissions.
